original_text:
at the sound of the hooves of galloping steeds,
    at the noise of enemy chariots
    and the rumble of their wheels.
Parents will not turn to help their children;
    their hands will hang limp.
korean_text: 군마의 발굽 소리와 달리는 병거 바퀴가 진동하는 소리 때문에 아버지의 손맥이 풀려서 자기의 자녀를 돌보지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: at the sound of the hooves of galloping steeds
at the noise of enemy chariots
and the rumble of their wheels
Parents will not turn to help their children
sentences.korean_translation: 부모들은 자녀들을 돕기로 돌아지지 않을 것이요
